abstract: Senate Democrats block Republican bill to fund Homeland Security Dept, which has become proxy for wider disagreement over Pres Obama's executive actions on illegal immigration.
lead_paragraph: Financing for the Department of Homeland Security has become the proxy for a broader policy disagreement over executive actions on immigration.

headline.main: Senate Democrats Again Block Homeland Security Funding Tied to Immigration
headline.print_headline: Senate Democrats Parry Vote Tied to Immigration

snippet: Financing for the Department of Homeland Security has become the proxy for a broader policy disagreement over executive actions on immigration.
